task.summary: Task #28: logic for CurrentStreak and RecordStreak
1. All user data related to Chinese Flashcards is now deleted when the Account is deleted.
Task #46: On the Review cards, display remaining 'New Words' and 'Review Words'.
Task #46, #47: review card: badge 'Completed', remaining and new word count
Task #49: card sorting in review and statistics
Task #42: Fixed order of words in reviews
Task #52: limit notifications to one at a time
Task #54: Display notification when the word is added to IN_REVIEW;
Task #55: Changed badge 'Completed' to an icon
